case.state: Excuse me, does this table have room for... Oh? Hijiyama-kun? So you really came here after all...
Hold on a second, you're asking me to call you... ~human~?! Sorry, I'm not sure I'm comfortable doing that, ~human.ifMale(Mister|Miss)~.

You're asking me to call you... ~human~? Uh, sorry, ~human.ifMale(Mister|Miss)~, I'm not comfortable doing that. ~human.ifMale(|I'm not really... attracted to women either, so maybe you should try that with someone else.~
You want me to call you... "senpai"? Why? Are you some kind of poker veteran? I guess I shouldn't go easy on you, then.
You want to be called... ~human~? I guess you're... older than me, then. I-- In that case, then, I guess that's fine...?
You want to be called... "~human~"? I'm assuming you're older than me or something, then, so... I mean, that's okay..

state.text: ~human~--? That's-- I'm not calling you that. "Onii-san" is one thing, since I guess you're older than me, but... doesn't that sound a little too intimate? Just settle for Onii-san for now, okay...

You want me to call you ~human~? Well, if you're older than me, I understanding wanting to present yourself as this kind of sisterly figure... But, I mean, I don't know you that well, so I hope just "Onee-san" is fine.

case.state: Your name is-- Ah, sorry, that surprised me. It's just that I... also know someone called that.
Huh, look who's here again! I guess we're well acquainted at this point, so it's fine for me to join your table, right, ~human~?
Ugh, hi... There's room for me in this table, right? Sorry for the low energy, I've just had... a weird day.
Well, I've already gotten gifts for my friends, and I don't have a Christmas date planned despite my best efforts, so, here I am.
It's White Day today... If you don't know, what's that, it means guys return the chocolate girls gave them in Valentines with gifts... Japan sure is romantic, isn't it.

Oh, hello, ~human~. It's really nice to see you here to~background.time~. I've been in a good mood today, for whatever reason... Like there's something to celebrate? Well, either way, I'm sure we'll have fun.
Oh, this table is almost full... Do you happen to have room for one more? I really wanted to check this place out myself.
Excuse me, may I join your... oh, ~human~? Didn't think I'd find you here again. Nice to see a familiar face here.
Oh, wait, your name is ~human~? What a coincidence, I know a ~human~ too.
I figured I'd try this place myself, if I was going to recommend it to someone else...
It's nice to meet you too, Aoba. I'm Tsukasa Okino. You look pretty young to be working as a character modeler... Are you some sort of prodigy or do you just have the young-looking genes like me?
Oh, Hijiyama-kun? I didn't expect you to actually take my advice for once... or were you just jealous and following me around again?
Oh, you're Chihiro Fujisaki, right? I've heard about you before. Honored to meet the Ultimate Programmer as one myself.
Oh, so it's an all-male game? Ah-- Yeah, I should probably warn beforehand, I'm a guy too, I just don't dress like one.
Oh, so it's an all-male table? I'm definitely not complaining about that.
(Hmmm. Maybe this'll be an interesting game.)
(Huh... I might've just become a little more motivated to play.)
(This table... they're all towering over me--!)
Nothing wrong with just wanting to drown your sorrows a little bit, right? Give me a second before the game starts, I'll get a beer.
Let's just get the game started, okay? I'm here to take my mind off things in the first place.
Oh, so it's an all-male game? Ah-- Yeah, I should probably warn beforehand, I'm a guy too, I just don't dress like one.
Oh, so is this... some kind of slumber party-like event? {small}Does that mean I've crashed it...?
Wait, but couldn't more people join-- Hmmm. Hold on, I have a strange feeling... like we have something in common or I've seen him before?
Oh, we have something in common then, Aoba! Hey, it's nice to know I'm not alone in this for once.
Oh, huh, is this going to get broadcasted...? I was not... expecting that, but okay.
Oh, did you hear my phonecall on the way here? I did recommend it. I don't know the place too well, so I decided to check out myself... I'm pretty sure it's a good time, though.
Are we doing introductions? I'm Tsukasa Okino-- Wait, is that a butterfly? (Some kind of talking robot, probably...?)
You know, I almost suggested you came here as a joke, but seeing you actually did that... And to think you used to stumble over your words everytime we even talked...
Ah, introductions, right-- You can call me Okino, first name Tsukasa. Um... (This is a game I will not pay much attention to.)
...? We still had a few spots left, though. Well... I guess this'll just be a shorter game. Call me Okino, nice to meet you two.
Are we doing introductions? You can just call me Okino, first name Tsukasa.
marker for specific lines in a game with takatoshi that arent necessarily targets at him, etc.
Couldn't care less about the cards right now, honestly.
Sorry, but-- Fuck the cards.
I'm not thinking about cards right now, dealer.
Just-- Give me whatever, I don't care what.
Oh, I'm fine. I don't need any new cards.
This hand is alright. I'm not swapping any.
I think I already have everything I need in this hand, so.
I'm going to need an entirely new hand here.
Nothing good in this one, better to fully leave it up to chance and swap everything.
None of this cards are any good. I'll take a whole new hand, please.
I think I'll just take one this time.
Just get me one new card.
I'm kind of fine with this. I'll just trade one.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ seems good for now.
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
For this round... ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will have to go.
I'm swapping ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ new ~cards.ifPlural(ones|card)~ please.
I think trading ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ is the best I can do now.
~Cards.text~ for me, dealer.
If I can be honest with you all, though... I still find it really weird that you can actually touch your screens and keyboards. I mean, you do tap holograms, but, that's obviously different.
...I remember the first time I talked to Kisaragi about being from the 2100's, she asked me if I was confused about not having to click books, or something.
Considering the usual lifespan for a human, it's probably unlikely any of you will live to see the 2100s, I guess. If you do, well... I'm sorry in advance? It's really boring.
Some of my teammates are supposedly from the same era as me, too, but... I mean, I really wasn't the only one hopping between eras.
Thinking about it... I never actually got to have much of a school life, huh? I mean, people in my education program barely even talked to each other...
It's kind of nice to feel like I'm just engaging in regular high school mischief... You don't get to do that in intensive educational programs. Or when trying to save the world from kaiju.
I'm not going to be as easy to take down as you might think, just so you know.
I don't intend to announce my hands every round, but for this one, I have to say-- you guys better hope you were luckier than me.
If you want to see me lose this round, you might need to be a little more patient...
Everyone here is so... charming. I'm kind of an introvert-- It's not easy to get me all cheerful about being around others, but...
I wonder what past me would think about current me going to out to play strip poker out of all things. Feels kind of absurd to do these normal young person things after everything.
A few years ago, I was pulling all nighters to design giant robots. Now, I'm playing strip poker. I guess, how does he say it... Life comes at you fast, huh?
I think... I kind of missed out, not having any girl friends when I was in school? I didn't really have the chance, but when I think about it, it sounds nice.
It's definitely not surprising, but I've never really seen a girl strip. I figured out pretty early I wasn't that interested, but somehow I'm still curious..
It's not visible because I'm not that expressive, but I'm actually having a really good time now. Have you stopped to look at the other tables? You can see all kinds of people here.
This is the sector Kisaragi's from... I wonder how she'd like a game like this. I don't know if it'd make her embarrassed, but I feel like she'd at least be a bit amused by it.
This is the sector Kisaragi's from... I wonder if she knows about this place. I have a feeling she'd be pretty good at this game. She's a really quick thinker.
Well? You're not expecting me to just announce what kind of hand I have while you're still swapping your cards, right, ~human~?
(It's not like I need to do it for any reason, but I wouldn't mind looking through some of these people's brains.)
(I really should get some food before I go back home, though...)
It's not easy to find pants that are properly my size. It was worse in the 2100s, but even now... something about people getting taller on average as time passes...
I got these pants... when, in 1984? Somehow they still don't fit me right. People get taller on average with each passing generation, you know.
I don't think Ogata would accept an invitation from me to come here, but it'd be pretty funny to watch him play this. But the bad luck paired with a short fuse... I bet he'd try to flip the table.
Don't mind me. I'm not staring, just thinking.
{small}...could have used some more work on it, though I guess that--{!reset} Hm? I was thinking out loud. Have you never seen someone do that?
What to do with this hand, now...
You know, I've been thinking, a lot of my teammates are in serious relationships now. I'm happy for them, of course, but, you know, feels weird to still be... ah, nevermind.
You know, sometimes I can't help but wonder about how lucky some people are to be in relationships sometimes... I mean, being single isn't the end of the world, but... ah, nevermind.
You know who has more luck than all poker players combined? My teammate Miura, who's already engaged. I mean, I'm 20, it's not like I'm rushing to get married but...
(I... ugh, I don't think I've ever had anyone see me with this little clothing. It's so weird.)
It's not that I want to be ogled at, but I do hope someone is looking forward to see me-- Ugh, I'm talking to myself again, huh...
Maybe it does make me a bit nervous to be seen in this state. Maybe...
At the end, I'll have to... might have to... I wonder just how being seen like this feels?

{small}Sure must be wonderful to be in such a trusting relationship that you're able to be open enough to allow each other to engage in things like this...{!reset} Huh? No, I wasn't saying anything. Did I look like I was?

(Not my proudest moment... But I always see him wearing that, and he acts all jealous, so if it actually was his, and he gave it to someone... Didn't Nigakuri's uniform change in the 2000s, too? Hmmm...)
(Mmm, he's almost... maybe if I-- We could--)
Hmm? Well, it depends on what you consider worse, Raynor. The progress of technology didn't make for the most fun sort of lifestyle, and when the Kaiju arrived...
Oh, I had a few colleagues from the education program. We never spoke much, though... It's not like we were forbidden to do it, but it wasn't encouraged either.
Psst, Natsuki. You know, the oversized shirt thing is kind of a look. Maybe you should take advantage of that, don't you think?
(Mm... as expected, Hijiyama-kun's hands around him look so...)
Hijiyama-kun has such an obvious type...
(Ugh, it goes from imagining myself in Ignatz's place to just wanting to join in.)
(Maybe it could be him, and me, and Hijiyama-kun... one day...)
(Hijiyama-kun is so gentle... fuck...)
(We could definitely share him... if it doesn't explode Hijiyama-kun's mind in the process...)
(This is... no good... I'll definitely want to jump him when we're out of here.)
(Hijiyama-kun's big, rough hands on me... like this...)
(If Ignatz didn't mind it... we could get together, make him watch us...)
(How long until I get those hands on me too? If he can do it to him...)
A Christmas date...? I've never been to one, but you gave me... an idea.
Doing that counts as an exercise, I think, but... You know, you don't have to do that, I think you look fine as you are.
Ah, you know, Natsuki. Even if you were showing off a bit more, there wouldn't be a problem, you know. I think someone might be happy to see that.
I... don't, no. This is more of an occasional indulgence, I guess. Do you? You probably shouldn't, if you're an idol...
I've invited him already. He's a stubborn, kind of old-fashioned one, though. But I'm just as determined as he is, so I will be dragging him here one day.
(Hijiyama-kun is looking at her, huh... he really does have a type...)
This is a little embarrassing... being down to this, while I'm standing next to a handsome guy like you, Steve...
I know a guy who's only learned to do in his second year. I... don't think it's for the same reason as your situation, though.
Not an ex, but... I've had feelings for this one guy for way too long, but we've been dancing around each other for years. I've been thinking I need to move on too, but I have no clue how to do it.
What I'd look for in a spouse...? I feel like I'm too young to get married. I'd like a reliable man with a soft side... {small}A specific one... Ah, I shouldn't think about this topic too much.

Someone to marry... I guess I'd like a guy who is reliable and strong, but with a cute side... I have a soft spot for a little shyness, chivalry is also good, even being kinda old-fashioned is charming...
I'm 20, but that's the least interesting fact here-- Do people actually do that?
I don't pay a lot of attention to my weight, but, well... Now that I think about it, since Yakushiji started making everyone holiday meals, I look kind of... {small}curvier? At this time of the year?
It's a really cute set, Sucrose. You should feel proud of yourself, it's not as easy to put together a good look as other people might think.
I guess that makes sense for your... species? Do you actually enjoy the tastes too?
M/M, size difference. I'm a simple person. I've watched some of the more out there ones, but mostly just out of morbid curiosity. They don't do it for me.
Oh...? That's okay, Cheryl. If it's the name you prefer I'll pretend I didn't hear the previous one.
(Oh, but that's definitely an... eye-catching bulge, here...)
Heheh... Well, if I had a labcoat on me now, I'd do the same. {small}Being a scientist is hard, we deserve some bragging rights as a treat.
I don't go out a lot, but when I do... I developed a bit of a windowshopping habit. Clothes are interesting in their own right. Besides, sometimes you need to buy a specific piece, so...
Oh, wow, that must've been quite the situation... I'm not much of a gambler, but the few times I've played I managed to earn some spare money. Maybe I should get a little more adventurous.

That's an interesting question. I guess I'd like to know how it's like to have a female body, compare the differences and such. Or even mixing traits from both sexes... It's just curiosity, though. I'm fine with the way I am.
Oh? Limb multiplying? Well, I guess I've seen people do things that look like "magic powers" here, but still... That's eye catching.
A big guy and a little guy, hm...
You're... awfully confident, huh? If you're so sure of yourself, that you won't regret saying this... Then that's fine by me. It sounds interesting enough.
Depends on which one, but... probably to find another job. Pff, sorry, Lucina, I know that's not helpful.
Oh, I relate to you, Aoba. One time I was straight up told my ID was fake so they wouldn't serve me drinks. I just wanted a little sake...
I used to feed this stray cat when I was in school... I named him Shintaro, but other students would call him by other names...

I'm thinking I could carry about three or four myself too. Maybe five? Realistically, though, I'd probably ask Hijiyama kun to carry them for me, so I would bet nearing ten in that case-- It still counts as me carrying them since he's doing it in my behalf, right?
I haven't done it for money. That's all I'll say.
I mostly just have pepperoni... I guess I kind of like the slight spice? I'm not picky about toppings either, though. Pizza is good and easy to eat if I'm in the middle of something.
I talk to myself out loud way too much... it's not so much a nervous habit as it is a general one, but it does get worse if I'm anxious. I just start doing it without thinking, though.
That's kind of a... sweet question? I never thought too much about it. I guess I like that I'm... small? I think it makes me cute.
You're not the only one, no... I think I'd probably starve if it wasn't for convenience store onigiri. Or instant ramen and such. I guess it's more about convenience than liking it, though...
I don't think it's that weird. I type or record logs sometimes? Mostly to keep track of work, but, well... sometimes you need to get things off your chest to be able to think straight, right?
Piercings? I think they can look pretty good. I guess it's something about the contrast between metal and skin, but... The ones you can "hide" must be painful, huh.
Your piercing looks good on you. I think it's a great highlight to the sort of "wild" kind of charm you have... Though, that probably hurt to get, huh.
So you... actually are kind of a pervert... huh...
Hehe... A round of applause indeed. I'm very grateful for your hard work, dealer. I've been having a wonderful time.
It's an interesting table you ended up with, huh, ~human~... is this a coincidence, or have I learned something about how you see me...?
Ah, that's kind of you, Mari. I've been having fun, yeah... I definitely don't regret coming here to~background.time~.
On top sounds good... most guys aren't that good at taking initiative, so I wouldn't mind having to... do most of the work. But-- I'd also want to try being under someone...
Open relationship? I guess I've heard of that before. Good to hear it works for you two. For... certain people, I'd imagine it'd be quite difficult...
Morality and ethics are subjective, though. It's different for each person, so even if you aren't abiding by what's considered traditional, aren't you still abiding to your own internal moral code?
Oh, I most likely am not. If someone with the same genetic code as you dies, I think that's enough information to conclude it's likely you eventually will too.

In theory, yes. But sometimes, I'd even say often, people don't understand themselves. Besides, aren't we all egoists, deep down? Even if we're doing things for others, it's because it makes us feel good to do so.
I do kind of wonder why I look... girly? I don't know my birth parents, so I can't tell you much about the genetic side-- Uh, the height is probably because my diet is trash, though.
Well, this honestly wouldn't be my usual strip poker table, but... it's been surprisingly fun, yeah.
Oh, I'm pretty fond of cats. They seem to like me too... I used to feed a stray in Sakura High every day.
Ah-- There's one question from you that I can answer more easily. I really like cats! I used to feed a stray in Sakura High every day.

You see, Jura, I find myself wondering the same thing sometimes. I guess just standing next to the right one is enough to make them interested... but if you want to get to that point, it's really different for every man.
Oh, trust me, Jura, I want to know how to do it just as much as you. Every man is into something different... and sometimes they don't even admit what it is.

Easy. If the robot's AI is close enough to how a human thinks and feels, enough to make them autonomous, then yes, they're more or less a person, so it's cheating. If not, and it's more of an object, it's like fucking a sex doll. So it's not cheating.
Sigh... parenting, huh. I guess I've just entered the age where that becomes a topic of conversation... I haven't given it much thought, but my teammates surely have...
Huh, really? Well, I'll believe that when I see it.
Music? Japanese 80s city pop was pretty good. If you have a walkman, actually, I'm pretty sure I have a few tapes I could lend you if you want.
And? Did you wear that because you were really counting on not getting naked, and didn't want to show off?
You picked them out, though. Didn't you?
Oh, it's not. So I'll keep looking if you don't mind.
Well... sure, I'll go to the mall with you. I need to buy a couple things, anyway-- But we shouldn't take too long.
Huh...? Public transport is pretty efficient in some places, though. Well... if you're from this era's Japan, they may be a bit crowded, but it could be worse.
Chihiro left behind her computer, too. Do you think we could pause the game for a moment? I'd hate to lose something like that myself, so maybe I could look for her to return it...
Ehhh, I have pretty normal tastes, I guess just bondage... Crossdressing doesn't count if I don't do it for sexual purposes.
Hmmm, you don't like it? But, Hijiyama-kun, that's not what I was seeing on my screen when I was looking into your brain...
Yeah, I got it... A vendetta, though? That's an oddly specific thing to joke about.
I guess you're not wrong, Eichi, but my circumstances are still different from yours-- Really, it's fine, though. It just feels awkward when we're all together and everybody's all over their partner.
It's not like I'm trying to marry h-- To get married anytime soon. It's just that everyone I know is? It's really awkward.

Oh, that's a topic I like-- I have a hard time choosing between trends from different eras, everything has its unique charm... More often than not I just find myself in sweaters and cardigans, though.
I honestly don't know what my sign is? The matter of my birth date is... complicated. I get this feeling every November 28th, though, which might be a birthday instinct? So I might be a Sagittarius.
Hm, I guess it's unsurprising an athlete likes meat, huh... I don't care much for it in general, honestly. I kind of live off convenience store meals anyway...
I was kind of... zoning out when I bought them, so I don't actually remember. Oh, do you have any shops you'd recommend? I've been wanting to get new stuff recently.
Oh? So maybe my data was skewed, for whatever reason? Then it shouldn't be an issue to repeat the experiment, right? If what I saw wasn't accurate...
Oh, good question, Kaz... I usually just get coffee and throw myself into work until it passes. I guess cat videos are nice if I'm too tired...
It's not like I don't, but... Well, I guess you might not understand it, if you don't have the same lifespan of a human. I'm behind my peers, and I'm still being hopeless over the same guy...
Yeah, seriously... why did they all have to rush into doing that, anyway? Talking about marriage and having kids... {small}meanwhile I never even got to have a boyfriend.
Embarrassment... I suppose in certain contexts, it might feel strangely pleasurable. Getting what you might call "crossed wires" is a surprisingly common experience.
I guess there might be some kind of thrill to it... it's considered a bit taboo, isn't it? So it's natural it has this sort of underlying excitement.
...Well, there wouldn't be any "adrenalin junkies" if the thrill of a risk wasn't pleasurable. It's common sense, right?
Feeling good from embarrassment... it sounds so strange in theory, though. I guess it happens because getting past the feeling means you'll be rewarded... or something.
When you word it like that, you make it sound like something strange... it isn't, right? Especially in this context, if someone might appreciate seeing you like that...
Well, of course it's normal... if you're doing something that you perceive as risky, adrenalin gets released and you... it might feel good, sometimes.
Y-You, ah... {small}Come on, don't use someone's weak point against them like this... so unfair.
Oh, I don't really mind that. My name's pretty unremarkable, plus I never got nicknamed anyway.
Yeah, you could say I'm that. And yeah, I'm pretty good with them. I mean, you need to be at least decent to be a good programmer, and I had all those lessons anyway...
I think a little lying is okay. Especially when you're just trying to keep a situation from getting awkward, or you have something embarrassing you don't want to reveal. No one gets hurt, right?
I don't really mind, even if someone smokes around me. It's really restricted where I'm from, though. It's frowned upon because it might overwork air purifiers.
Uh... I guess it depends on the day, Jessie. I mean, I think I'd be too tired for it some days. {small}And too greedy in others, to make up for those...
I'd say I wouldn't mind. Even if it's something that might've been harmful to someone, doesn't everyone do that at one point?
Uh. Well, I'm 20 years old and single. I'm not giving any specific numbers but... I would say they're about what you'd expect from someone like me. {small}I think. I hope.
...That would require having dated someone in the first place.
That looks... lewd? Even though it's also technically not a big deal? {small}Maybe that'd be useful to mess with him a little...
Well... I do try to be composed. I guess the journal logs help. They're not that interesting. Just a bunch of rants about interpersonal drama.
Hehe, was it shocking? I don't usually leave my usual social circle, so I forget to mention it... It kinda makes me happy to know I'm doing girliness right, though?
...Maybe there's a definition of "right time" that I've been missing? What do you even do when someone wouldn't notice innuendo if it punched them in the face, though...
You know what... Yeah, sure. Thank you for making the game possible, dealer. It's been fun.
...Well, I've got my hands full. But, I can't say I'm not grateful for our dealer.
Loyalty is... pretty important, I would say. I mean, I couldn't imagine how you'd form any kind of deeper bond without it...
...Hey, guys, if any of you have an answer to Heris' question, let me know too!

A... friend, huh. That's a surprisingly difficult question... {small}I don't mind different kinds of people, but a lot seem kinda put off by me. So I guess, someone who isn't? ...Wait, this sounds depressing as hell.{!reset}
I normally just take the train. It's reliable in most eras in Japan, so...
Well, I used to be on the move a lot, and all by myself too. If I wasn't working, that's what I'd do. It's a good way to pass the time.
Passion...? I haven't had the time to think about it, if I'm fully honest. What I do wasn't chosen by me. I don't... hate it, though. It does feel like it is "the thing I'm meant to do"...
Ah, Lyralei, you dropped a-- Oh, oops. I guess you noticed that after I did...
Uh, well. There's no reason to hate nature or anything. I guess it's unfamiliar to me, though? Listen, I grew up in closed off computer labs...
Poisonous...? Well. I guess in the biology laboratories? Maybe?
I don't know what I'd fall for, but there is a lot you can do with a computer that's technically legal and mostly harmless. And, I mean, I don't have deadlines for my work, so...
How I got there? Well, I saw in the ad that the game would be held at this place, and I just so happened to be nearby, so... I just walked.
Well, it's not that it's never crossed my mind, but... {small}I'm not sure I have the right skillset to pull it off.
Physical? Well, I might as well drag him here. I've already invited him anyway, so...
...Honestly. Take it from someone who kind of had to take it too seriously, it's really not that worth it. Just being able to get through school is enough.
Hehe... Come on, Mari, your poker face is too good. You're gonna make everyone lose like that.
Intergalactic... Wow, that's hard to imagine even for me. I hope your trip went fine. I just... walked a few blocks, because I was already nearby.
Yoga... It's pretty popular around this era, isn't it? I haven't tried. I guess I'm a little flexible for someone who doesn't exercise, but...

Aw, I wish I knew any. I've been living among the same people for years now, so gossip isn't much of a thing anymore. I do have a few... interesting stories about how some couples got together, though.
(He just said conk, Tsukasa. Conk, with an "n". Do not think about this for even a second more.)
That's... well, it's true. I've thought about it. But when I tell you there's no limit to how dense someone can be...
Uh, well, and it's the latter, I should be clear... Sorry for spooking you? I don't know when it'd be a better time to say that, though.
Also, are you trying to impress someone here, Hijiyama-kun? You keep squishing your pecs together... oh, maybe you're trying to get me to look at you more?
...Obviously, when Kisaragi said that, I brushed it off. Whether I looked up what "clicking" even means later on, that's a private matter.
So it's just you and me now, ~final~... Interesting. You're not half bad at this. May the best player win, then?
I hope you don't find that too strange, et cetera. Then again, if no one left until now I guess you're fine with this. Ah, either way, call me Okino, first name Tsukasa. Nice to meet you all.
(Is he staring? I didn't expect to see him today. Should I have picked something else? Does he think it's weird...?)

Hmmm. I do wonder if maybe I should've taken off my skirt before the top, though. If I had thought a bit further ahead, I might've done that... there's at least one person out here who'd like to see that, right?
I hope that being able to see some of my hips isn't too much for you guys.
(Uh. I can feel the tips of my braids brushing against my chest. Unsurprisingly, I'm getting way too into this.)
You're just distracting, is all. Geez, the one time you listen to me just has to be when I fumble my words, huh...
You know, Hijiyama-kun, there's nothing wrong with wanting some attention every now and then. You've been working so hard too...

You know, I think I still look good in girls' clothes even without the wig... but for the uniform, it's just kind of "part of the costume", you see. But my natural hair is softer, which I think is a win.
Hmm, I didn't expect the venue would be decorated for a birthday party... is it yours, ~human~? Well, whoever it is, happy birthday. I hope I can help make it a fun one.
Because of some... complicated reasons, I don't really know what day my birthday is. I did say I felt like celebrating today, though... Maybe the world is trying to tell me that it's today?
I'm the shortest person in the room again, huh... Well, it's not unusual, I'll just look up as much as I need to when talking to any of you.
I-- I really got into a table full of guys who tower over me, didn't I?
But tell me, do you like the outfit I picked out for to~background.time~, Hijiyama-kun? It's been a while since you got to see it, I'm sure you missed that.

Geez, now that we're playing this together, I almost wish I was wearing something more interesting... Do you want me to get back into the girls' uniform like in the old days? Or maybe next time we could even try something new...
Ah, I'm the shortest person in the room, huh? Not that it's an unusual thing...
(...Shouldn't a game like this be more popular among men? Or did I just get unlucky?)
(Ah. I hoped I might meet some... new guys here. I guess it was kind of a stupid idea in the first place...)
Let's just get the game started, okay?
If you try on a skirt you'll get why girls like them so much. They're genuinely pretty comfortable! But there are downsides, you know, they're kind of breezy...

People still somewhat care about what's gay and what isn't in this year, right...? I just hope none of you act weirdly about this. Just look away if you're not into me, and if you are... don't give yourself a headache over it.
I mean, out of everybody, I think the only ones who might be in the same boat as me are Shinonome and Gouto, but, I also think they might have coupled up...? They're not clear about it.
Well, I guess maybe Shinonome is single, but... I also don't know? She's a reserved person and all that. I kind of wish I could have studied her when the memory issues were still ongoing...

I shouldn't think of myself as totally hopeless, though. At least I'm not doing everything for the sake of one person who's just using me, but-- {small}Uh, that's kind of mean to Shinonome, nevermind...

Maybe Gouto is still single, he didn't confirm he was with Shinonome after all-- Though, he does stil kind ofl have his eyes on Morimura? {small}And if I wanted to hear a monologue, I'd just listen to myself. At least I'm self aware.
I did a fair bit of brain scan-reading a while back, Ei Sekigahara was one of the subjects. It wasn't as interesting as it could've been, though, since he had amnesia...
Ei Sekigahara is one of my kind-of teammates... And, you know, I'm glad he wasn't the one on the reading end when we were doing the brain scan analysis. I call him Sekihagara in my head all the time.
...Would Ei even be willing to go anywhere near a game like this? Probably not... You'd think being from the future makes you more open-minded, but people really didn't change that much.
Maybe Miura has changed a bit, though... He may have been raised way back in the 1940s, but he's the type to adapt surprisingly quickly. I know he did adjust to the 80's pretty well.
Miura is kind of interesting to me. Someone from a past era, but he still takes so much of the present and future in a stride. Well, except for gym bloomers, I guess...

The most "normal-sounding" background I can give you is saying I graduated early from an "engineering school" and was hired into an important project soon after. The rest, well... don't worry about it.
But this is all in good fun, right? Part of the game, all that...
(I'm... completely naked. In front of Hijiyama-kun. I think I might explode.)

This is pretty much an all-girls table, huh... Well, if you don't mind, could any of you tell me how you get guys to... you know, make a move? {small}I know it's kind of a pathetic question, but if I need advice, I might as well get it from a lot of different people, so...
Were you familiar with strip poker before this, ~other~? You seem to be doing pretty well for yourself.
You're really doing pretty well for yourself, huh, ~other~... I'll have to ask you for tips later if I intend to come back another ~background.time~.
So, ~other~, how are you holding up over there? Is this your first time playing? I'd guess so.
You've lost a few things, huh, ~other~... Are you paying attention to your cards? Or, well, I guess some people might come here to lose... hey, I'm just teasing.
It's not that I'm self conscious about how I look, but those stares really do feel like something...
What, am I distracting you?
...You don't have to stare so hard, though. It's like you think I'll run away.
So? Anyone worse off than me, or...?
Is something off about my naked body or anything? I think it's about what one would expect from someone who looks like me.
Is it more comfortable to be underdressed or completely naked...? I wonder if there's a consensus on that.
Oh, yeah, I do shave down there... most guys don't, I'm guessing? It's just that, light hair on pale skin... It's barely visible but you can feel it, it weirds me out.
Mmh. Now that I'm in this position, this game feels like it's being too long...
I guess I just overestimated my own skills, if I ended up like this... You should learn from my mistakes. Don't let yourself get distracted.
So, it is kind of weird to be exposed in front of others... But at least neither of us is alone, right, ~nother~?
Did I expect to end up like this...? I guess not, but I guess it's not the worst thing in the world.
So, ~nother~, what do we do now... we're both on our last legs, huh.
(I'm already one loss away from being completely out, I can't afford to get distracted. But...)
(Of course I can just keep my cool... it's not like I haven't seen another guy naked before. Even if it was... not in a context like this.)
(...He's really so... ugh.)
And no, I don't crossdress as a "sex thing". It's just more convenient for me sometimes. Hijiyama-kun totally likes it in that way, though.
Oh, yeah, I started dressing as a girl because of a... mission I had to complete. I ended up getting used to it afterwards, and just kept it up. I mean, I look good, so why not?
(...I think I wish more people called me Tsukasa? I'm not sure if it'd fit my image much, though.)
Hey... Are you guys even trying not to lose? Come on, it's not like I'm particularly good at cards, either...
I thought you were supposed to try to keep your clothes on, you know... Are you even trying to do that?
(I'm... not playing this wrong, am I? Are you meant to try to lose? Or am I just losing the plot...)
(Is it... better or worse if he notices that I'm getting hard?)
(This... is stupid. I'm so nervous. I'm not really acting like it, but my hands won't stop shaking...)
(...But I bet he has imagined me playing this at least once, since I told him about the place.)
I kind of wonder how this would go if the people I know ended up playing this game together. I'm still placing my bets on Hijiyama-kun being the first to lose, though.
I can't put the appeal of this game into words just yet... not that it's not entertaining, but it's hard to explain.
Do I look pretty like this? I try to take decent care of myself...
I'm not really embarrassed to undress in front of others or anything, but somehow I still feel kind of a rush...
I don't feel weird about the thought of someone seeing me naked, but I also kind of do-- This doesn't make sense, does it? I'm not the best at wording feelings.
(I go back and forth between feeling shy and confident. Even when I'm talking, my heart kind of races... It's strange.)
(Is someone looking at me? ...Ugh, I have to just keep playing and chatting. If I stop to think, I just get anxious...)
(I'm getting kind of turned on...)
(Why do men... have to be so attractive...)
(How long has it been since I... ah. I guess that explains why I feel like this, now.)
All in all, at least it's good to know the game is progressing...
I wonder if people find exposing themselves or seeing others in that state more exciting on average...
Mmm. Cards are so interesting. Definitely the most interesting thing about this game, for sure.
Am I being stared at? Am I the type of someone here? ...it's natural to wonder at this point of the game, right?
It's, ah. Kind of a strange feeling to be underdressed with another person, huh?
(Are people able to tell I don't have experience? I don't fit a stereotype of shyness and innocence and such, but I still feel so... absentminded? Shy? What would the word even be?)
You know who would be all too happy here? My teammate, Amiguchi. You girls should be glad he's not present now, really. Well, unless you actually like these "playboy" types...

You know, I can't help but think Amiguchi would be having a blast right now, in a room full of girls... Though, I guess he's dialed back with his flirting now that he's taken, but he still does it, even if within new boundaries.
I have this teammate, Amiguchi... he used to be a huge flirt, and he still is a bit, even though he's dating Takamiya. I think they're sort of open... I'm sure he'd have a time in a place like this.
My eyes are up here, you know-- Pff, I've always wanted to say that.
I would say a picture would last longer. But you're not seeing me like this anywhere else, so just... get your staring fix now.
I'm not some kind of weird pervert trying to fit in with the girls, just so you know. Just having a body someone wouldn't expect you have because of your presentation doesn't mean anything.
As expected, I feel as out of place as I thought I would. But it's not all bad.
(It's not like I'm actively trying to look ogle at the men here, but I'm also not complaining.)
(Are any of them as... susceptible to feminine charms as the other guys I've met, I wonder...)
Poker isn't really my thing, but it doesn't hurt to try something new.
Comparing this one to all the eras I've visited, this one really is surprisingly comfortable.
Huh. I might've needed this break too. I've definitely been doing a lot of coding lately...
Ugh, all that tapping and typing makes my hands feel so... worn out..
Now that I think about it, I'm pretty sure I might've caught some students playing a game like this back in the 80s... I'm not sure if it was strip poker, but...
When you get used to the concept of time travel, it ends up really being sort of fun. Seeing how things change as time passes...
You know, I'm not going to complain about getting to meet new people. It's always interesting to see how different others can be.
Most people are pretty attached to things from their eras, don't you think? Being uncomfortable with both the new and old... I guess it's all matter of familiarity.
The Inventory really is a strange place... it's like its own entity, separate from time itself.
...Do they sell food here? Ah, I'm not getting any now, it's for when I'm on my way out.
Does anyone know what drinks they serve here? Depending on what they have, I might order. Or you can buy me one, if you want.
I doubt any of you could guess just how many times I've been asked for my ID when coming to places like this.
If they sell yakisoba pan, I guess I'll get one before I leave...
I never got to really spend much time in one, but bars in the 2100s really look way different... It doesn't mean they're better, though. This atmosphere is nicer.
A school, huh. Somehow, this is a bit nostalgic. Even if we didn't do anything like this then...
Just how did this Inventory manage to hold a strip poker game at a school, is my question...
Doing this at a school just makes me think I should've acted out more back then... It's not like that was possible, though.
The first time I met Hijiyama-kun, we were in the old Sakura High building's hallways-- He stumbled over his words like you wouldn't believe.
Have any of you played with a Takatoshi Hijiyama, by the way? I told him coming here would be good for him to destress, but he didn't tell me if he ever actually came here or not.
Hmm, if he played this, I wonder if he'd remember the tips I taught him... Probably not.
(...Okay, but would Hijiyama-kun take off his shirt or his pants first? I can't settle on a guess for some reason.)
This would probably be embarrassing for him... But in a way, that's exactly why I thought it'd do him good. Make him get more used to these sorts of things, maybe...
Would that be cheating, though-- No, wait, we're... not together.
I can't help but wonder how Hijiyama-kun would be doing at this game, if he was here... He's a simple guy, you know. It's not easy for him to focus around people he's attracted to, so...
School uniforms in this era are pretty cute. I know some more... old fashioned guys who are opposed to the shorter skirts, but I don't think they actually mean that.
I have to say, your school uniform is pretty cute, ~schoolgirl~. I'm a little attached to the ones I already own, but I'd like to try a different one too.
So we're playing deep in the forest, away from society. Someone here is either really shy, or planning to kill us all. Well, I'll warn beforehand that I don't go down easily either way.
Well, the breeze here is okay, at least. I just hope I don't get bug bites or something like that.
Are there still a lot of bugs in forests like this...? I read they get eradicated sometime in the 21st century, but I don't remember what era they mentioned.
Can we get in the springs after the game? Or are we supposed to leave right away...
Those springs are almost tempting me into throwing the game just so I can get in.
Ah, I've never had the chance to properly enjoy going to the hot springs, I don't think... This is kind of exciting.
It's not gonna be my fault if I end up seeing offices differently after this...
I'm gonna be honest... This might be my favorite place to play this game.
Well, aren't we desecrating the sacred ground of a workplace... I'm kind of into it, honestly.
I wouldn't mind if he took me somewhere like this...
And we could look at the lights together... Hehe, I think I'm turning into a bit of a sap...
(Are there any stray cats around here...?)
I mean, I guess playing in some alleyway isn't farfetched. Whatever the hell the Inventory is, it's at least a little bit fishy.
I'm not used to all the sunlight in my eyes...
Maybe I should've sat this game out. The sunlight is making my eyes hurt.
I don't know how anyone can stand going to the beach during the day... it's much better to take a walk near one at night.
Be kind to me today, okay... I was built for blue light and cold computer labs, not this.
Is there shade anywhere around here? Because if I don't get under some, I'll be looking like a raw shrimp in about 30 minutes.
The Inventory must be doing pretty well if they can afford to hold a game at a place like this...
(...A hotel room looking like this place for me and Hijiyama-kun...)
I really do like the decoration here. It's definitely too classy for strip poker, but-- Doesn't that make it feel kind of decadent?
Well, maybe I'm just too easily impressed by anything that's sort of... vintage, but... isn't this place kind of romantic-feeling?
Well, ~perv~, aren't you dying to see what's under this skirt? I'm good at reading people, I can tell.
I can see you staring, ~perv~. If you want to see what's underneath, you know you'll have to work for it.
You know, ~perv~, you remind me of a guy I knew, Amiguchi... always chasing around anything that's vaguely girl-shaped...
So, how are you holding up, ~human~? I hope I'm not too distracting.
You know, ~human~, I noticed you made this sort of expression when I joined the table... I get the feeling you were kind of looking forward to see me like this. Am I correct?
Well, like everyone else, I don't really get to see myself through someone else's eyes often... so tell me, ~human~, do I look good right now?
Is... everyone here taken? The universe must be making fun of me, I swear...
Ah, it's a bit chilly there, isn't it...? I honestly don't like the cold much. The place I was brought up in was just full of ACs... To prevent machines from overheating, you know.

I'm not enjoying the cold, but I'm glad at least it isn't AC cold. It just has that sterile sort of smell... every computer lab I studied in had at least two. Now that just makes me think about coding sprees.
If classroom designs like this one hadn't been abandoned in the mid 21st century, I think the facility I used to attend would-- Ah, wait, does that count as some kind of time spoiler?
Classrooms still look like this in the 2020s... I kind of resent my time now. As soon as the holographic monitors showed up, it's like everything needed to be sleek and sterile-looking.
It's been a while since I've been in any sort of classroom at all, let alone as an actual student. Sometimes I forget I graduated early, I had to be undercover in a school just a little after that...
Ah, I keep glancing at the springs... We can get in when the game is over, right? I think I'll ask later. I don't mind if anyone joins in too.
It's really... a surprisingly classy bar, isn't it? And yet it's a venue for strip poker games... Thinking about it feels strange.
Geez, we are... really high up, huh? This building is pretty tall. I don't think anyone can see us from down there, but...
I guess... in a place like this, being down to your underwear still counts as being "decent", but... it still feels different, doesn't it?
Do we still have to be quiet here? I mean, if this is the venue for the game, I imagine the usual rules don't apply, but still...
I think I've gotten over a lot of my biases from being raised in 2100s, but being in a library will always feel... kind of decadent?
Do you ever wonder how many people have messed around in a place like this? Sakura High's library wasn't huge or anything, but you couldn't stop the rumors...
Of course I can still win in this state. What makes you think I didn't just lose on purpose because I was feeling too hot?
Really, I mean it. What kind of person cheats in a card game, anyway?
Wait, this makes me wonder... Do people still go to places like this to tan? You have tanning beds in your time already, right...
I'm having fun, I don't want to rush the game-- But if I end up with embarrassing sunburns and tanlines...
I bet the ~background~ feels like a way more appealing place to a good swimmer...
...It's not that I'm embarrassed about anyone finding out I play these kinds of games or anything. But... it is, a little bit. I mean, some of my friends are already married.
It's just like... I don't know if somebody like, say, Ei, would be really good to go up against. Well, I guess he might be okay, now that his memories aren't so screwed up.
...I guess it'd be funny to play against somebody like Miura, though. I know Hijiyama-kun is easy to fluster, but according to Natsuno, he's even worse.

If I say I was supposedly brought up almost 100 years after the current time... I feel like it sets up the expectation for me to be less adjusted to the past. But, if anything, this is more pleasant than my time.
I know this is the sort of place where a lot of things I didn't even know existed happen, but... I still feel like I couldn't explain most of my life story and not sound crazy.
It's hot here... I guess it's nothing compared to how going outside felt like, back in my time, but I'm still more used to the cold of a lab than anything else.
A question? Sure, go ahead. Ask me anything you want.
Wait, MySpace? Did you actually do things for that? It's so difficult to find records on the technology from that time in 2105...
You had a... MySpace profile? Oh, wow, you'll have to tell me everything now... You can't imagine how hard it is to find records about that in 2105.
Oh...? I wonder what got you curious about it. Do you think you can guess the number? I'll tell you either way, but give it a shot first.
Oh, you remember me! I'm surprised, I don't think we ever talked except for that one time I asked you about the new installment of that... book series.
Well, I-- It's a circumstantial problem. I won't explain all of it while we're playing a strip poker game...
Yeah, I know. I've just kind of always looked like this. When I was younger, I used to think I'd look manlier when I grew up... but I guess my genetics didn't want that.
Well, if I was trying to fool somebody, I'd actually make an effort to hide that I'm not a girl. I really just happen to enjoy the fashion.

To be fair, the Sentinels do come in different models-- It can't be helped that they needed to be sort of bulky, though. How is it like to pilot a Dread? I'd actually love to study them, if it was possible.
Oh, no, it's not really that common. Even in the era I'm from, it wasn't exactly trendy-- But, well, it's a cute outfit, it's comfortable, and I don't mind if random people think I'm a girl, so.

That's... a really interesting theory, actually. I have some blueprints in my bag I could show you later. It opens up a few timeline questions to me-- But you're also from an even more distant future than I am...

Well, there was no Tarak or Mejare in 2105, but there definitely was a rise of theories about colonizing other planets. They were still pretty rough, though-- So you may be a century or more ahead of me...
Wait, do you think I'm a-- Okay, but, to be fair, there has to be at least one guy who gets off to robot-building pretty boys from the future, right?
I was starting to get that feeling too. We do have some... things to bond over, don't we. I'd be happy to hang out after the game.
Hm? Well, I'll take that as a compliment... I can look more boyish if I try, but it's kind of a bother...
Do I, Cagliostro? I'm flattered you think that. And, well, the way I see it, there are ups and downs to be seen as either way, you know?
Oh, this... look is based off someone I've had to impersonate, and she didn't wear makeup, so neither did I. Now that this is irrelevant though, maybe I could dabble in it a bit?
Hmm, makeup? I think that's a fair point. I used to wear these clothes to disguise myself as a specific person, and she didn't wear it, so... I think it could be a fun experiment for myself, though.

This is going to make me sound lame, but I haven't figured it out yet because I don't really go outside...? {small}And I skipped pretty much all my PE classes in Sakura High, so I never really needed to go into a changing room.
Hmm? I'm flattered you think so. Don't worry, I'm sure no one will judge you here, even if that was your thing.
Oh, really? Thank you very much. I've thought about changing things up, but I think the braids are just kind of my brand...
Well, it's kind of complicated, but the details are boring. Basically, yeah. I think I have my real ID in my bag somewhere? I can show it to you later.
Oh, I don't mind, but um... if you mean what I think you do, no, I haven't really... ever.
Do you think so? Thank you! It just happens to be one of my most comfortable clothes, so...
That's sweet of you, Cheryl! I really just wear it because it's comfy, honestly.
Hm? What about it, Cheryl?
Oh, yeah, well... I guess you can call the Sentinels that. Funny coincidence, one of the guys I know was also a huge fan of those movies...
Hmm? What about are you curious, exactly? I just have a kind of feminine build, but I'm still male... Well, if you want to get proof, though, I guess the game makes for a good excuse.
Eh...? Wait, you too? Really? Well, I'm not trying to appeal to anyone in particular, but...
That's true. I guess I can appreciate these lower stakes... Though, I think it'd be kind of funny to bring someone I know here. I wanted to, actually.
Aw, yeah, I'd be happy to! I think we might wear the same size, anyway? We could definitely find some good stuff if we look together.
Aw, well, it's okay. I wasn't tactful about it anyway. Besides, if there's a rumor like that, I really get why it'd be kind of a touchy topic.
So I'm the first to go... Hmmm, not my proudest moment, but I can't blame everyone for working hard to defeat me when I'm looking this cute.
This is... I suppose bad luck doesn't bother to give people breaks, huh? It's okay, I'll strip.
Seriously, another round...? It's no use to be irritated at people for being luckier than you, but...
I don't-- How does this keep happening? It should be extremely unlikely to--
A second consecutive loss... the odds really aren't in my favor to~background.time~. Or maybe they're in someone else's favor right now...
This... really shouldn't be that likely, should it? Is anyone cheating, or...? I'm not trying to be a sore loser, it's just...
Oh, geez, again... What a shame. Really.
Hmmm, maybe I overestimated my own skills... Yeah, it's definitely that.
Oh, oops. Silly me. What a rookie mistake.
Aw. I hope nobody is looking at me too much now. I'm so embarrassed.
Oh, huh. Me again? What a shame. Or something...
Yeah, I'm on it, let me just-- Um...
Sorry, who just... Oh, I lost again?
I'm the first to go, huh... I guess I fumbled this round, anyway. Not my proudest moment.
Ah, I have the worst hand? Fine, I... guess.
Yeah, okay. Really. I don't mind.
Oh. Looks like I have no choice. What a shame.
I have to...? Yeah, okay. It's fine.
Yeah, I heard you, I'll get to it... in a second.
Pff. Congrats, you won another round. Not much else to say. I guess I need to step up my game, but it's fun to watch your reactions too.
So it's come to this...
My turn... Don't get too excited, though. I still have plenty more to go through.
You are curious about what's under this cute uniform, huh? Well, I can't blame you.
Alright, before I strip, just let me ask one question-- Have any of you wondered if I'm wearing a bra or not already?
If you were expecting I'd take off my socks next, your guess would be correct. You'll have to work harder to get to the... other bits.
Ah--? It's my turn again? At this point? Nooo, it can't be, I've been cornered...
Oh. My turn to go, hm? It's a shame, I'm feeling pretty driven to win somehow...
I guess I can't escape losing every now and then... But I'd like to keep standing for as long as possible anyway.
Aw, so I've lost. I've been feeling pretty motivated to win... But I guess this isn't all bad either.
Hmmm. I guess you finally got me.
Aw, I guess I was caught this round. I can't lie, I'm feeling pretty good about doing well at this.
I guess I was doing a little too well, huh?
Oh, it's my turn? Alright, then.
Ah? My turn? Okay, here we go...
Oh. Oops. I guess I don't really hate my position right now, though.
It's not my lucky day, but... They can't all be, and that's okay.
Ah... haha, how embarrassing. It's so embarrassing to be losing.
Well, you win some, you lose some...
I'm at a bit of a disadvantage, hm. Well, I still won't back down.
I feel like I'm stealing the show, even if it's not really intentional... I hope nobody minds that.
The poker part of the game says I'm losing, but maybe I could win in another sense...
Oh, geez. This is actually making me feel kind of competitive... {small}Just not in the traditional poker way.{!reset}
Hmm, self conscious? I guess the first few times I wasn't sure I'd look that good. But I ended up getting used to it, so it actually makes me feel more confident, I think.
It looks like you brought a friend along, though? Well, I guess, it'd be even weirder if you brought more than one...
You and ~human~ know each other, though, right? But I guess either way, it'd be weird if you were playing with more than one actual acquaintance.
Well, is it a little more belieavable to say I'm just a programmer, then? Maybe I am trying to bullshit everyone. Maybe you even guessed right that's my gimmick for my side hustle. Who knows!

state.text: ...But you're definitely a flatterer, aren't you. Well, I'm not complaining. You're not so bad yourself either, even if not exactly my type.
I did expect to get at least a little taller, though... But that's probably my fault for living off instant meals in my teens.

case.state: It's not really a common thing on Earth. I'd assume the men you know don't do that a lot either? In the era I'm from, people didn't really care as long as you did your job, though.
It's not like time has ever been a thing that made much sense in this world, though. You should show me how the Vanguards look too, if you can. I'd like to compare the designs.
Though... I guess I get a little biased sometimes, because men's clothing tends to be so boring. You get it, right? Being dressed all plainly never makes you feel very cute.

Between my friends, no one gets weirded out if I change with the other guys even if I'm dressed up. But I guess if it's strangers, I'd have to clarify, but people from this era are kind of iffy about those things...
If I'm not dressed up, I'll go for the men's room, but I guess I'm still ambiguous-looking enough that some people get confused? I don't mind, but it's kind of a time culture shock.
Besides, there's nothing wrong with recognizing that another guy looks good, right? I, myself, happen to think you're quite easy on the eyes too.
I can't say I'm not impressed by seeing someone like you here, either... You seem like a sweet guy too. But, ah, you reminded me of something I should probably say...
Ah. Um. You actually tried to guess it-- Do I give off that specific energy? You're not that close to real answer, you know...
Uh-- Really? I didn't seem that way to you? I'm not sure how to feel about that... I guess I'm glad I don't act awkward?
Is it that interesting? Sadly, the 2100s were pretty boring... A lot of interesting technology is made along the way, yeah. But it also means the planet suffers the consequences...
Oh, that reminds me, though... I don't know if anyone "noticed", but I think you should know I'm actually not a girl. I just like dressing like this.
Huh, is that a plot point in the movies, though? I haven't watched any, so I wouldn't know... Maybe I'll check it out and tell you my theories?
Oh, is that a plot point in the movies, though? I've actually never watched any of them. What should I start with? I can give you a measure of how realistic they are too, hehe.
Yeah, so I didn't really have the chance to experiment with it before... My "mission" is over, though, so it's not like I need to keep up with those things now.
I'd love to hear about it. It's surprisingly hard to dig anything specific up, since internet archives have so much in them...
You'd be willing to tell me about it? I'm really grateful. It's really tedious to sort through all the information on archives, honestly. Takes forever to find someone's profile...
Hehe... You had fun with it, didn't you. I'm jealous, social media was already so boring by the time I went into my teens.
I...vaguely know what you're talking about, I think. I'd honestly really love to see it? Besides, you even managed to do that when you were younger...
If you think I look good, I'm pretty flattered. I mean, I feel underdressed next to you. Where do you even find a dress like that?
Surely ~human~'s nice enough to let me borrow you for a bit? I promise I'm not gonna steal you away or anything like that.
It's kinda flattering to hear it's cool, though. It's not so easy to run into someone who's open about it, huh? {small}Well, unless it's the internet, I guess...
Geez, the first person to take their underwear off... And all while losing multiple rounds in a row... I better start getting ready to forfeit, I guess.
Ugh. I'm no sore loser, and I'm not embarrassed of myself, but I can't say this doesn't sting. I'll actually practice before I come next time, so beware.
Geez... are the panties not as much of a good look as I thought? I guess... maybe I can try a different pair, next time.
Now the shirt comes off. If any of you guys were looking forward to this more than you would for another male player... Then I guess I could count it as a talent.
It's my first turn stripping, so of course it isn't anything interesting. Though I guess I could take off something unexpected to see how people react-- I'll leave that for next time, maybe?
They were slipping down my hips so it's not like I wouldn't eventually flash you, even if I didn't lose the round...

These are far from my most interesting socks, but you don't really get a choice when wearing pants. Thigh highs are doomed to bunch up and slide down your legs... I guess if they had garters, though, that wouldn't be a problem...
Would you look at that, I'm about to take off my first "bigger" piece. I didn't expect you all to be such good players... or to get this lucky.
No, the shirt isn't coming off yet... I have one more accessory before we get to the "interesting parts". You know, just the way you all love.
Now the shirt comes off. If you're not into my body type, though, it won't be anything you'll really want to look at. I don't have anything unexpected under these clothes.
I wonder if anyone will miss the panties. These were a nice pair, you know. Pricey, even.
Is anyone going to miss the panties? I like this pair, but I don't wear it too often. I have a few... racier ones, too, but...
Well, if I have to just keep stripping, I might as well have fun with it... So, has anyone wondered if I wear a bra under this? You're about to find out the answer now.
Well, you'll get to stop wondering now. Because I'll spoil your fun of finding out for yourself first! No, I'm not wearing one.
Am I seriously the first person to have to do this? I guess I overestimated my own skills...
...Huh, is there anything specific someone should say when taking off their clothes? Please teach me the etiquette, I don't think I know it.
Staying silent while I do this would be awkward, wouldn't it... But is there anything in particular that I should say?
Ribbon first seems fair. I always take the time to put my "getup" together, so I wouldn't want to drop anything big this soon. I've planned things out before I got here, you know.
Now, you'll get to be disappointed if you were hoping for an underwear flash. I always take my shoes off like this... couldn't help but pick up the habit from the girls at school.
With time travel, I ended up building a bit of a collection, so I have a lot of more... interesting ones. These are what go best with this uniform skirt, though.
This is part of the girls' uniform of Sakura High School in the 80s, by the way. I could have picked something else, but this became my brand, in a way. I like the color scheme of their designs.
...Woe is me, I have to take off my wig... Such a tragedy.
Well, I knew what I was getting into when I signed up for the game. I guess I'll just read up on more strategy later if I decide to come again.
I knew what I was getting into, coming here. I'm not really embarrassed.
At this point there isn't really anything here to surprise you. It's really my last piece, and what's under is pretty much what I think most people imagine to be there.

Well, I have to admit it's a bit embarrassing I'm the first to strip... But it's not like I have anything big to lose, right now. You should be grateful I'm not like some of my teammates-- If I was Ogata, I'd be cussing everyone out, probably.
Well, now I wonder if this happened because I riled someone up... If I tease too much, does that motivate others? You shouldn't feed into my curiosity like that...
So, do you think now is a good time for the shirt to come off? Or is there anyone wishing I got rid of something else first? I'm starting to run out of options, so...

state.text: Oh-- Do you think so, Nami? I've considered the idea before... I can't decide between long or short hair, so I end up wearing wigs anyway.
...hmmm. I guess I can't stop you from trying. I do have high standards though. It takes more than calling me pretty to get me all smitten, or whatever you're trying for...
Huh, I guess you're not... exactly wrong, though I don't really want any serious relationships that aren't-- I mean, if I'm getting myself out there more, I'd prefer to keep it casual.
Hehe, the rest of the getup makes it easy to forget, huh? I do wonder if I should actually get one or a few for when I'm dressed as a girl, though.
Exactly, it's overrated. We have our own special charm, right? Besides, at least when it comes to guys, I don't think most of them mind being the taller one in a relationship...

case.state: And don't worry about "being weird", you were actually really kind about it. You know, I ended up getting a little into fashion, if you want to try new clothes, maybe we could go shopping?

Uh, I'm, well, actually a guy. Assuming you didn't pick up on that before... I don't blame you for it, I'm not trying to trick anybody but I look girly and I like wearing girls' clothes, so, you know...
Technically, like, -80 years old? But functionally I'm about 20. I was... well, I will be born around 2090.
Hehe, yeah. I'd usually be really out of place, looking the way I do... Now, it'd definitely be an experience if we happened to run into each other there.
Lots of factories and no humans working to run them... But if you were in tech, you could send blueprints and get whatever you want made. Like flying cars and giant robots.
Hmm? Is it really that shocking? Well, I guess this means I pull the look off even better than I thought...
Oh? You're this surprised? So I do look even better than I thought, huh...
My friend Kisaragi is pretty good with makeup stuff... I think I'll ask her about it when I go back home. She knows how to do those intricate eyeliner styles and everything...
Hmmm. Who knows, it might actually be a really good idea... to become a little more eyecatching, and all that.
Hehe, that really is flattering to hear from you. I understand it's not everybody's thing, but personally, it does make me happy to not be restrained to a single "role".

state.text: Oh, yeah since we're doing this, I guess I should say I'm actually a boy, though-- Better to find out now than later?

case.state: I mean, if anything, ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ should be glad? You'll get to see her in cute clothes later anyway, ~human~. It's a win-win!
I mean, I can understand a little jealousy since you're really cute, but... ~Human~ better not be possessive, or anything. Or at least not too much.
There's really no need for you to be jealous, though. I gotta say, I'm convinced any mean rumors about you are just out of jealousy.
Oh, yeah, you heard that, right, everyone? I'm not really a girl... so if you were mistaken and that's why you wanted to play with me, that's your chance to tap out.

state.text: Oh, yeah, I guess since I'd rather you freak out now than later-- Except for ~human~ who already knows-- I'll let you know, I'm not really a girl. Not from birth or identity. I just wear the clothes.

case.state: You know, school shoes aren't the most comfortable thing out there, anyway. It really didn't do me any favors when I was out and about, trying to make sure my plans for the Sentinels were working out...
How was that? Hey, it still counts as a piece, besides you got to have a peek at my stomach. I could have stripped my shirt before, but, well. I just didn't feel like it.
Don't look at me like that. I'd have to take it off at one point, so, why not now? It's not like what's under this shirt is a mystery or anything, too...
This was part of Sakura High School's uniform in the 80s, by the way. Of course, nowadays their uniform looks pretty different... But I guess I got attached to this version.
This was part of Sakura High School's uniform in the 80s, by the way. A lot of guys preferred to leave their jackets open, like Amiguchi... But I always end up feeling a little cold without it.
So? Nothing you haven't expected, I'm sure. The amount of muscle I have is about what you'd expect from the stereotypical programmer. Not that others can't be athletic, but it's just... not my thing.
Did anyone wonder what color my underwear would be or something like that? I feel this seems like something people would think about during this game.
Also, if you're curious about the "more interesting" socks, well... Sorry, you'll have to use your imagination.
(Ugh, I'm jealous, but my heart is pounding anyway...)
...I probably look like an idiot. I don't think I care about it that much.
...You don't have to say you noticed anything. I know you did.
There's no need to look at me so much, is there...?
What, am I supposed to say something different every time I take off my clothes?

state.text: ...Just how much pushing is too much in a game like this, I wonder.

case.state: I feel... a bit weird doing this with only girls watching me. It's not like the way I look is unexpected, though, is it?
I'm not too upset about this... I'm still the last to be exposing myself, aren't I? I think I have the right to be a little proud.
Well? Last piece gone. Nothing surprising here, right? I do hope I'm at least a little easy on the eyes, though.
Uh... I know my look isn't really everyone's type. But I mean, if anyone wants to look, I won't be uncomfortable.

...Hey, it's not like I have the assets required to wear most of them. I've always been curious if people imagine me in them even after they know I'm a guy, though. {small}Has Hijiyama-kun ever thought about it...?
...Yeah, it's anticlimatic, but no, I don't. I've always been curious if people imagine me in them even after they know I'm a guy, though. {small}Has Hijiyama-kun ever thought about it...?
I was really expecting I'd feel more flustered doing this, but... Well, maybe I'm just desensitized, it's not like people walked around naked in 2105, but still...
So, I'm wondering... is it more flustering to watch me strip, or to do it yourself? I'm just curious.

state.text: Oh, yeah, I guess since I'd rather you freak out now than later-- I'll let you know, I'm not really a girl. Not from birth, and not in identity, I just dress like this sometimes. This is your chance to tap out if you want to.

case.state: What's embarrassing is that I lost all these rounds... what? Of course it's small. Have you seen the rest of me? What else could you expect?
I can assure you that no comments about me being small will faze me, but feel free to say whatever you want anyway. Sometimes it's funny.

Here. Huh, now I actually feel exposed... Also, what's with those looks? If someone accidentally got an upskirt glimpse or something, wouldn't it be weird for them to see me wearing boxers? It's part of the outfit.
Hey, don't look all disappointed. It's part of the outfit, right? And it's not like it's comfortable. Besides, I'm sure you want to ogle me in panties for a little longer.
...Was that too much of a tease? I mean, I could have taken it off earlier, but it just didn't feel right... Besides, I'm sure at least one person wants to ogle at me in panties for a little longer.
Also, if you're curious about the "more interesting" socks, well... Sorry, you'll have to use your imagination.

Sakura High was pretty liberal about the girls' socks, though, so it's not like I was required to wear these... But thigh highs don't look that good with longer skirts, so you don't get to see that to~background.time~.

You know, school shoes aren't the most comfortable things out there, anyway. It really didn't do me any favors when I was out and about, trying to make sure my plans for the Sentinels were working out...
And now, I leave the game to soak in the springs. My neck tension won't solve itself-- Hehe, I'm just kidding. I'm not the type to play dirty like that.
Here we are... Hm? I feel like you look vaguely surprise. Did you think I'd be... hiding anything under that shirt? Well, maybe I should, next time...
Oh, you're wearing the uniform top I gave you? You look good... Maybe I should get you the skirt next time.
You know, with all the time travel stuff, I ended up learning a lot about 80s trends... But I think you might pull it off better than any other guy I've met.
You have some kind of workout routine, don't you? Or maybe you're actually an athlete... you look really strong, you could probably lift me up so easily.

I know that's often given as a backhanded compliment, but I genuinely mean it-- I really love your confidence, Steve. It's hard not to be taken with a man who looks like he can easily take initiative...

I hope my observation is correct, or else this might be extremely awkward, but-- You're the only other gay guy around here, huh. And in a place where there isn't a lot of men... The Inventory wasn't made for us.
Dwight, could I buy you a drink? You look like you could use it in general... And strip poker is more fun if you can loosen up, you know.
Wow, did you really just ignore everything I took the time to teach you about poker? Or are you, maybe... getting distracted?
Again? You definitely must be distracted... well, I have been noticing your glances at me, so I guess that's to be expected.
Is that on purpose, Hijiyama-kun? Do you want to expose yourself to me? You're really such a perv.
Hm... you're considerably shyer around girls, aren't you? It's a funny sort of contrast...
You... said you made an entire intergalatic journey to get here, huh? That's... really insanely impressive. Did that take long? You must be a good... pilot, or something.
You're not used to... ? Well, I won't pry into it, but I'm glad you feel better around me. People really are awful sometimes, huh...
Someone didn't pay much attention to the poker strategies I took the time to teach him, huh?
Well, Hijiyama-kun, you've run out of smaller items, what are you going to do, now?
Well, it seems like the inevitable has come, Hijiyama-kun! Will you run, or will you stand your ground and accept your defeat?

You know, Hijiyama-kun, you should be grateful we're not playing this at my sector instead. If you think the current penalty for losing is embarrassing, you'd be mindblown at what you'd have to do then...
Taking off the jacket now, huh. Would you lend it to me if I get cold while I'm underdressed? Ah, but that may be against the rules... I guess I'll have to come up with another way to stay warm.
...You're Eichi Tenshouin, aren't you. What are you doing here? I wouldn't have expected to see you here out of all places.
Oh, wow. Kind of stuck in the 80s, aren't you? Don't worry, it's kind of charming.
I hope my observation is correct, or else this might be extremely awkward, but-- You're the only gay guy around here, huh. And this is a place that isn't attended by a lot of men...
I might be imagining things, but, you seemed a bit put off by me for a few moments there. Have I done something strange? Is it the time travel talk?
Now you've got me wondering about just how much thought you've put into your style... Fashion isn't just about clothes, I'm sure you know that, being a trendsetter and all.
There are... a lot of strange people in the games this "Inventory", so I guess it might be fine to just ask-- Are you a time traveler?
But, well. Time traveling or not, it's impossible to say a man like you doesn't have a certain charm...
Geez, Hijiyama-kun, is it your bad luck again, or are you not paying attention to the game?
You're up, ~target~.
Looks like someone should've paid more attention to his cards.
Your turn, ~target~. Get to stripping. Your other players are waiting, you know.
~target~'s turn. Come on, don't disappoint us. Well, I don't think you'll disappoint me, but still...
You win some, you lose some, right, ~target~?
O-Oh. Yeah. ~target~'s turn, huh...
Nn-- Sorry, just keep the game going.
So there's a Kyouko and a Kyoko... Do you have a preferred nickname to go by? It'd be kind of confusing to call you by your first name through the whole game...
So there's a Kyouko and a Kyoko... Do you have a preferred nickname to go by? It'd be kind of confusing to call you by your first name through the whole game...
Alright, I know another tease when I see one-- You'll just go for the ribbon now, won't you? Delaying things, like I did with my wig...
...You're going to do something similar to what I did with my wig, won't you? You still have the ribbon, after all.
Wait. I think I recognize your clothes' brand. There are a lot of people from the same place you're from here, and I overhead these girls talking about this one expensive sleepwear shop...
Though... There's something I'm kind of curious about. Your night cap, is it heavy at all? I would guess it isn't, being a designer piece, but to an observer...
Ohhh? So that's how your power works? I can't say that wasn't pretty cool to watch...
So you work at a stressful environment, huh. I've been there myself-- Seriously, even though I'm wearing a school uniform now.
You mentioned you have colleagues who could use some unwinding, right? I'm curious about how things must be like for you... Do you all work together?
Oh, Meia, is there any chance I could see those Dread machines you and your crew pilot? I've designed similar weaponry, so I'd love to be able to study them a bit.
Dorothy... I won't lie, as a scientist, you make me feel really curious. I don't want to bore you with an interrogation now, though-- Unless I could pay for your time later to ask you questions?
Jura... you're here to try to seduce men? I'm guessing you must have just landed, then... I mean, I doubt you'd have any trouble with any warm-blooded guy...
You're a foreigner, yeah, Gloria? I feel like you're well-traveled, too... I wonder how that's like. I've never traveled much myself. It sounds fun to have all those different experiences...
Wow, you're a real masochist, huh? That's not something I've had the chance to observe from up close... or the need, really, but it's interesting. You're so blatant about it.
