You've been pretty positive about this game, even though it looks like you just landed here randomly... I'm guessing your adventures get pretty wild.
You arrived here pretty much at random, but you don't even look like you're too shocked. None of your adventures have looked this before, though... or am I wrong?
But... if that's not rude to say, I'm surprised you took interest in this game, honestly. It's not strange, you know, but you give off a feeling that you're above something like this...
Both vampires and succubi are said to have seductive powers in mythology. If you're a hybrid, does that mean you get double the power...?
Vampires and succubi are described as supernaturally seductive in mythology, right... So if you're a hybrid, are you twice as powerful in that area? {small}Geez, I could use some of that.{!reset}
Hey, don't you have a bit of an advantage over the rest of us if you're a detective? I mean, you definitely know how to read people...
All things aside, though... I noticed you call me by my first name rather than the last. Maybe you have a bit of a bold streak, huh.
Kyouko... You seem kind of familiar to me for some reason. I know I've never seen you before, but I mean, the way you speak...
I think I've had a feeling since the beginning... But you're really just going to take your ribbon off now, huh.
...Oh, hey! I'm pretty sure I've seen you around a lot. I doubt you'll recognize me, but you're the girl who buys manga at Suzuki's bookstore. right?
You're... really not a fan of hard work, are you? Ah, no judgement here-- I'm not the pinnacle of diligence myself.
So, you're not really super diligent either, huh? What's up with it, if you don't mind me asking? Did your shrine overwork you too much?
You're straight up walking with your bow and quiver around... I mean, I guess it's not weird considering your origins, but-- That's definitely my first time seeing one in real life.
Ah. You're also single and... looking, right. Though you're... straight up looking for a spouse. {small}And we're the same age... Am I being left behind by my peers?
Sorry if that's overstepping, but, you look like you're getting more nervous by the second... Is everything okay, Lyralei?
Pff-- Beans?
~target~'s up... I'd wish you good luck, but I don't think I have to, huh.
Your turn to strip, ~target~. Though I doubt that'll break your spirit, hehe.
You're up, ~target~. You still look like you're having fun, though-- That's good, your energy is a little contagious.
Well, it's ~target~'s turn... I think she's fine with it, though. If I may make an assumption...
~target~'s turn... You really don't mind this, do you? Hey, I'm not judging...
At least the person who has to strip this round doesn't mind it. Hey, it's really not hard to notice, ~target~...
Hey, it's your turn, ~target~. I hope you enjoy yourself? You definitely look like you are.
You're not doing too good, huh, ~target~... that's quite the bad luck streak.
Sorry you lost. If it makes you feel better, I'm not gonna stare or be weird.
Oh. You're up, ~target~. Not doing too well, huh? Just know you can leave anytime if you're uncomfortable.
Oh. ~target~'s turn. Well, it should be... fine, right? You still have a lot of clothes to go through.
Sorry you lost. If it makes you feel better, I'm not gonna stare or be weird.
Oh, ~target~'s up. Sorry you lost... but someone had to, right?
It's ~target~'s turn? Well, I wanted to ask about your outfit, but I guess I'll do it later...
You don't... want to end up like me, right, ~target~? Or do you...
(Kind of awkward but, that's okay.)
Sorry you had to lose this round, ~target~, but I'm trying to win myself, so, you know...
Well, I hope that's not too embarrassing for you, at least.
~target~... Are you trying to get somebody's attention? You don't have to lose the game for that, you know. I could help you two out or something.
That's... quite the bad luck streak, huh. Unless you're trying to get someone to look at you? You don't have to tell me who it is, but... tell me if it worked, later on?
Oh, was that a tie? I wouldn't have expected to see something like this to~background.time~. Nice change of pace.
Oh, was that a tie? I wouldn't have expected to see something like this to~background.time~. Nice change of pace. (Now back to what I was doing before...)
Don't worry about it, it'd be my treat. You seem like a nice person, I feel like it'd be a shame if you didn't have a fun time here to~background.time~...
I don't know much about idols, but I do know you from reading up on the Tenshouin Zaibatsu. And don't worry, I'm not... trying to cause problems for myself.
Right, right... I understand it, Hijiyama-kun. I won't make fun of you. I know it can be hard to grasp that if there's something else distracting you.

Oh, trust me, you can't even imagine. You know, if I had the second worst hand, I'd have to be the one undressing you, and vice versa. And that's just one out of many things the game could make us do...
It is pretty crazy, I'm still trying to figure it out, but it's too advanced to-- Ah, sorry, rambling about it probably doesn't help at all. I'll try to keep to myself more.
Time is pretty strange around there, yeah. I've met people from the 80s before-- You still stand out, though. I guess because you're American? You certainly had different trends from Japan...
...You should probably take a break from the game and try to get this under control if possible. Nothing good can come out of something like this.
Huh... really? I mean, you just have this specific look. I feel like I could find a picture of someone just like you in some medieval themed western book...
I know it's a different case, but I'm a bit isolated too... getting out wasn't encouraged when I was a student, then I just didn't have the time.
I doubt I can fully understand your situation, but I get not being used to socializing and such. I've always been too busy to not be isolated.
I don't know if that's your thing or not, but just so you know, if you want people to pay attention at this point, it's wise to go for some bolder moves.
So, are you being shy by taking off your ~clothing~, or are you rubbing it in that you're doing better than other people at the game?
Wow, ~target~... I wouldn't have thought you'd be a cruel person like that. Taking off your ~clothing~ while your fellow players are in this state...
Hmm, you won't show some solidarity to your players who are already underdressed?
It's understandable to start small, but, you know... I'm sure no one would mind if you didn't.
Well, if you still have small pieces, it'd make sense to take them off first. Unless you really want to show off, of course.
Nice move, but you can't hide behind things like your ~clothing~ forever, ~target~.
A student-- Yeah, well... it's not surprising you'd assume it, given I'm wearing this uniform and I look pretty young. But I'm actually not, I just happen to be dressed like it.
Oh? So your style is ahead of your time's trends, even? I feel even luckier that we've ended up in the same table, now.

Well. It's not like I should expect things here to always be like the things I know. But maybe the dreams are-- Ah, nevermind. I won't bore you by rambling about work... {small}I have a bit of a bad habit with that.
You're sweet, aren't you. Really, it's okay. The only thing I want in return is for you to have fun. Break out of your shell a bit, you know.
One piece down, now. Be careful not to slip up too much, ~target~.
Not bad. It was just your ~clothing~, though, so it's not like it makes a difference.
It was just your ~clothing~, but I'd still advise against getting too cocky...
Ugh, are you making fun of me?
~target~... you're a cruel man.
I wouldn't have guessed you have that sadistic streak, ~target~...
You're more unfair than I thought, ~target~...
Nnn... of course it's useless to whine about it now, but still...
If you still had your ~clothing~, then you can still stand to lose a little more, right?
There you go. Just ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~... It wouldn't be any problem if you lost a few more rounds after that.
Hey, it's too soon to be ashamed, right? You can still lose a few more rounds... Before you really have to worry, I mean.
You can see the quality of the fabric from here... And it suits you really nicely too. I think you'll end up getting someone's attention in this game, Caitlin.
My school? Well, I'm wearing this uniform, but that's not exactly where I got my education... I guess I can describe it as a boarding school focused on computer science? Or something like that.
Huh...? I didn't know something like this was possible. Then again, I suppose you can do pretty much anything, if you have the right skills and the assets...
Wait, is she going to leave her clothes here...? And why would she join in if the game might make her uncomfortable...
Would you mind letting me study you? Just out of curiosity-- you'll just have to sit down and wear this headgear for a bit. Though if you fidget too much I might have to restrain you...
But then, how do the powers themselves work? Are they like pheromones? Could it work on someone who isn't into girls? ...I'm overthinking it, aren't I.
Oh, not that I mind it, of course-- It actually feels kind of nice. But you did surprise me with the informality.
I hope that doesn't make me sound like a complete weirdo. It's just that the pink hair is hard to miss. I think I also see you windowshopping at some stores I like...
But do you... really, actually live in the wilderness? As in, without using any sort of technology? I... can't conceptualize that at all.
Maybe this is a stupid question, but how are ~clothing.toPlural~ made in your time?
They probably don't have factories mass-producing clothing items where you're from, I'd guess... So ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ your ~clothing~ handmade?
I can't deny it's a little weird for me to watch a girl do something like this and enjoy it... But from a scientific perspective, it's kind of interesting?
...I don't come across as creepy if I watch you, right? I mean, I'm not attracted to women, but I feel like I'd learn something about... stripping with style, or something?
You know, in a way it's kind of admirable that you're so willing to do this... I mean, it's always admirable to be bold, I think.
Is it... experience that makes someone so open to doing something like that? I'm not embarrassed myself, but you look like you're really having fun with it...
You're going for your ~clothing~? I think I know a few girls who'd like to own ~clothing.ifPlural(some|one)~ just like yours, ~target~.
Oh, ~clothing.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~clothing~ suited you well, though. I hope you don't lose ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
Hmmm. That's actually really cute, I should keep it in mind in case one of the girls' birthdays come up.
~clothing.ifPlural(Were|Was)~ your ~clothing~ expensive, ~target~?
I'm not expected to say something every round, am I...

state.text: Pff, honestly... How do you even still have that, when I'm down to this?
